member.summary: Gets the name of the repository.

member.summary: Gets the type of the client. For this class, the client will always be Remote.

The deprecation state to set

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRepositoryItemDescription(System.Guid,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Gets a description of a repository item. The description contains identification, naming, and summary information, but not the entire contents of the item.
member.param: The identifier of the item for which a description will be retrieved.
The agency of the item for which a description will be retrieved.
The version of the item for which a description will be retrieved.
member.returns: A description of the repository item.

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRepositoryItemDescriptions(System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{Algenta.Colectica.Model.Utility.IdentifierTriple})
member.summary: Gets descriptions of multiple repository items. The descriptions contain identification, naming, and summary information, but not the entire contents of the item.
member.param: The identifiers for which descriptions will be retrieved.
member.returns: A collection of descriptions of the repository items.

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRepositoryItemDescriptionsBySubject(Algenta.Colectica.Model.Repository.GraphSearchFacet)
member.summary: Gets the repository item descriptions for items that match the specified relationship search parameters. The search will query for items referenced by the target item specified in the search facet.
member.param: The relationship search parameters.
member.returns: A collection of descriptions of the repository items that match the search parameters.

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRepositoryItemDescriptionsByObject(Algenta.Colectica.Model.Repository.GraphSearchFacet)
member.summary: Gets the repository item descriptions for items that match the specified relationship search parameters. The search will query for items that reference the target item specified in the search facet.
member.param: The relationship search parameters.
member.returns: A collection of descriptions of the repository items that match the search parameters.

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRelationshipByObject(Algenta.Colectica.Model.Repository.GraphSearchFacet)
member.summary: Gets a list of items that reference the specified item, according to the provided search options.
member.param: The parameters for the relationship search.
member.returns: A list of matching items.

member.name: M:Algenta.Colectica.Repository.Client.WcfRepositoryClient.GetRelationshipBySubject(Algenta.Colectica.Model.Repository.GraphSearchFacet)
member.summary: Gets a list of items referenced by the specified item, according to the provided search options.
member.param: The parameters for the relationship search.
member.returns: A list of matching items.

member.summary: Gets the latest version numbers of multiple items.
